segments.text: I notice the girl is just standing there, waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent and expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how dangerous it is for her brother to be standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely focused on getting that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's cute how she's just standing there, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope her brother doesn't fall off the stool while trying to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks like she's having a great time, even if she's just waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mom will notice what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny how absorbed they both are in their little cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they make a good team, actually.
segments.speaker: PAR
